page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Many people have video's in their homes and rent films from an average price of about Â£1.50 a night.Other people go the cinema for about Â£2.00.Videos are very popular. There are two night clubs in Park Parade which many people go to for a drink or just for enjoyment.There are disc jockeys in bars for everyone to listen to and use.Pubs are quite popular with groups of people who go for a quiet drink or a game snooker or darts.The leisure centre is a main spot where you can play various sports including football and squash.Youth Centres are used by young or teenaged children who are bored with not much else to do around the area.Many people enjoy the theatre to watch plays or musicals.There are facilities including drink stalls and toilets.
